name: Vernal ☀️🌧️
description:
Game runs slow on mobile? Try this instead.
🌧️🌱🌦️🌿🌤️🌷☀️🌺 Spring has arrived, and so have you. Fertile ground needs attendance...

This is a slightly expanded version of my LD41 entry, spruced up a little bit with fixes, sounds and extra #content. I actually don't have much else to say here, have a gander and see what happens? Touch everything, and everywhere.

Some advice:
  • Start by finding seeds.
  • Seeds can be dragged and dropped.
  • There are different kind of plants. All are useful.
Audio credits

Various soundscapes by Finnish Broadcasting Company
Mouth sounds by djphazer and Kyster
Audio clips used under CC BY 3.0 license
Credits track is Water Lillies by Density & Time

If you get that far, stick around for a bit. It's a good song.
